metadata.title: CVE-2021-40926 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in demos/demo.mysqli.php in getID31.X and v2.0.0-beta allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web scriptor HTML via the showtagfiles parameter.

criterions.comment: php-getid3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
